description: Born in the positive calendar November 2, 2328, Loran is a 17 years old boy belonging to the Moonrace and the main character of the series and the pilot of the eponymous mobile suit, WD-M01 âˆ€ Gundam. Loran and his friends Keith and Fran are secretly sent to Earth by Dianna Soreil in advance of her main colonial force, to ensure that Moonrace settlers can still survive there. The three of them separate upon landing and integrate themselves into the Terran population.
name: Loran Cehack
